name: Murder...
description: An unassuming village with only a handful of residents, but one of them is a murderer! Use your skills as a master detective to put the clues together and deduce which one of them is the villain. Good luck detective...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5GHz or faster / Intel Pentium, AMD Athlon or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce FX 5200 or better Storage: 52 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.3GHz / Intel Core i5 , AMD FX 6300 Graphics: NVIDIA Quadro K4000M / GeForce GTX 485M Storage: 52 MB available space
